DOC.brief_summary: Resistance exercise plus vascular occlusion may induce greater improvements in strength and muscle mass resistance training alone. The investigators speculate this training strategy could be beneficial in patients with rheumatoid arthritis.
DOC.criteria: female with rheumatoid arthritis Disease activity scores > 2.6 use of antiTNFalpha drugs for at least 8 weeks BMD < 20 kg/m2 fibromyalgia cardiovascular disease
